scripts.setup: npm install && lerna bootstrap --no-ci && npm run build:core
scripts.build:core: npm run build --prefix packages/core/mashroom-utils && npm run build --prefix packages/core/mashroom
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build:plugins
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules/ packages/core/*/dist/ packages/core/*/lib/ packages/core/*/node_modules/ packages/plugin-packages/*/dist/ packages/plugin-packages/*/node_modules/ packages/test/*/node_modules/ packages/test/*/data/ packages/test/*/log/
scripts.release:prepare: lerna version patch --exact --yes --force-publish && npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run build
